lead_paragraph: An article on Friday about Susan Illston, the federal court judge presiding over the perjury case of Barry Bonds, referred incorrectly to a part of her background on the bench. Another judge, Vaughn Walker — not Illston — oversaw an unrelated phone records case involving AT&T and the federal government.
